metadata.synopsis: One-liner plus HasMet for the replacement editor of the Baldurs Mouth Gazette in casr the players murder Ettvard. Should be terrified as his predecessor (or possibly two predecessors) recently died in the died.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Kill both Ettvard Needle and Malek Stones in the Baldurs Mouth building, then take a long rest and Ettvards Replacement will spawn.

0.speaker: Syril Valdemar
0.text: No time for chit-chat, I'm afraid. Lord Gortash may be dead, but the news lives on!

1.speaker: Syril Valdemar
1.text: I've no time for idle chatter - the news doesn't sleep, especially in such dangerous times.

2.speaker: Syril Valdemar
2.text: They tried to silence us, but as long as the city breathes, the Mouth will speak!

3.speaker: Syril Valdemar
3.text: Even if you've nothing better to do, I'm afraid I have. It's not every day a lord drops dead!
